Docs.summary: Represents a reference to a JavaScript object whose functions can be invoked synchronously.

MemberSignature.Value: public TValue Invoke<TValue> (string identifier, params object[]? args);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance !!TValue Invoke<TValue>(string identifier, object[] args) cil managed
Public Function Invoke(Of TValue) (identifier As String, ParamArray args As Object()) As TValue

Docs.param: An identifier for the function to invoke. For example, the value "someScope.someFunction" will invoke the function someScope.someFunction on the target instance.
Docs.summary: Invokes the specified JavaScript function synchronously.
Docs.returns: An instance of obtained by JSON-deserializing the return value.
